thread.title: BRIEF-Maxar Technologies Reports Qtrly Net Earnings Per Share Of $0.55

title: BRIEF-Maxar Technologies Reports Qtrly Net Earnings Per Share Of $0.55
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:16 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Maxar Technologies Reports Qtrly Net Earnings Per Share Of $0.55 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Maxar Technologies Ltd:
* MAXAR TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS, DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $1.47
* CONSOLIDATED REVENUES FOR Q1 WERE $557.7 MILLION COMPARED TO $373.5 MILLION FOR THE SAME PERIOD OF LAST YEAR
* CO HAD TOTAL FUNDED ORDER BACKLOG OF $3.3 BILLION AS AT MARCH 31, 2018 COMPARED TO $3.3 BILLION AS AT DEC 31, 2017 * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EPS OF $4.65 TO $4.85
* SEES 2018 CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS OF $300 MILLION TO $400 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.99, REVENUE VIEW $547.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.61, REVENUE VIEW $2.24 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
